attributes.action: Ban the use of police drones to monitor UK citizens activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not wish to continue to be the most spied upon society on Earth. We therefore regard the recently, and much vaunted, "police drones" announced in Merseyside as a vile invasion of privacy, and just the next notch up in an ever tightening police state the previously free Britain is in danger of becoming. We want them to be banned.
